constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 62 (Monday, April 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. GREENE of Georgia:
H.R. 2446.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, United States Constitution
[Page H1727]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: To award three Congressional Gold Medals to the law enforcement officers and those who protected American cities during the Black Lives Matter (BLM) riots beginning on May 26, 2020.
